job_title: Registered Nurse in Van Nuys, CA
pros: 1. Good pay especially if you’re a new grad. This place is a good start if you want to be on the floor.
cons: 1. Toxic environment, especially CNA’s (some of them are very rude and unprofessional). Even though they know you’re new/orientee, they wanted you to act like a seasoned nurse. 2. Disorganized HR and management

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Whittier, CA
pros: Good teamwork, schedule negotiation, Clean environment

The staff at Barlow Hospital are friendly and professional. They do an excellent job weaning patients and have the highest success rate in the area. The building is also conveniently located next to Dodger's Stadium.
cons: The fact that Barlow is a small facility may be construed as a pro or a con. Upward mobility within the company is limited, but you might enjoy the family feel.

pros: The best thing about working here was their staff.  Every one was very welcoming to new workers and everyone helped each other out.  The facility was pretty clean and the equipments are fairly new.
